channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 20th August
item.description:
GIVE AND TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY 15 MINUTES DELAY BOARDS CARRIAGEWAY POTHOLE 1000X300X40MM TARMAC PATCH STATS REQUIRED (CW6 Pothole)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 20th August
item.description:
Cut back overgrown hedge for visibility of Traffic light head 42mtrs x 3mtrs Flail may be required Stop and go TM Traffic lights to bend (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 20th August
item.description:
28 days, with give and take to cut back vegetation growth at base of tree, obstructing view of traffic from 204 and footway. (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 20th August
item.description:
Unstable Slab FW 1 x 400mm Give and take TM With Temporary FW Closure Outside 34 Stats required (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long stretch of pothole, 20th August
item.description:
The state of the road is deteriorating and needs serious attention. Specific concern that the road will worsen due to A40 closure in Sept - Dec for Hambrook bridge construction. The road will be used as a rat run for people cutting off diversion time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Lyefield Road East, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 20th August
item.description:
Outside Sacred Hearts there is a series of deep potholes running next to the pavement, difficult to miss due to the road being so narrow
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of fly tipping in layby, 20th August
item.description:
There is a huge amount of fly tipping in the lay by, large pile of bricks, chair on top and some foam tiles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
